item.title: Using WLST
item.description: You can use the WebLogic Scripting Tool (WLST) to manage a domain running in Kubernetes. If the Administration Server was configured to expose a T3 channel using the exposeAdminT3Channel setting when creating the domain, then the matching T3 service can be used to connect. For example, if the domainUID is domain1, and the Administration Server name is admin-server, then the service would be called: domain1-admin-server-external This service will be in the same namespace as the domain.
